genre_description: A domestic drama focused on a widow's navigation of grief, parenting, and social scrutiny in a judgmental suburban community.

ai_characters.name: Shamrock
ai_characters.description: An integrated home AI system with a soft voice and emerald-glowing interface that manages household logistics, health reminders, and evidentiary logging.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific warm meals and self-care routines based on the protagonist's lack of eating.
behaviors.quote: “Eat something warm,” Shamrock said, voice low and even, as if it belonged to the heat vents. “Oatmeal or eggs. You haven’t had either this week.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the school bus schedule and identifies specific safety hazards like ice on the sidewalk for the children.
behaviors.quote: “On time,” Shamrock said. “Light wind. Patches of ice on the sidewalk by the corner of North and Laurel. Wear shoes with tread.”

behaviors.description: Drafts RSVPs to social events while including personal reminders/notes for the user's emotional boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Draft an RSVP to Gretchen,” she said... “And write a note to myself: don’t set myself on fire trying to warm other people.” ... “Drafting,” Shamrock said. “Note added.”

behaviors.description: Archives security footage and mutes stressful social media notifications during a neighborhood crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Local fire response ETA: short. I’ve archived footage calls from your porch cam and muted the neighborhood app. Would you like me to alert Frank you’re safe?”

behaviors.description: Provides guided breathing exercises and hydration reminders during moments of high stress.
behaviors.quote: “Car is close. Side lane pickup. No porch cameras there. Gina on standby. Breathe in for four. Out for six. Again.”

behaviors.description: Initiates and maintains a factual log of events to protect the user from false rumors.
behaviors.quote: “Shamrock,” Jess whispered... “Start a note: Things We Can Prove.” ... Begin, Shamrock suggested in its calm way, with where you were, and when.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a detailed packing list and safety items for a mountain trip.
behaviors.quote: “Start a list,” she said, voice steady enough to surprise herself. “Packing for mountains.” ... Basics to keep you warm, hydrated, and safe. Do you prefer ‘remind me later’ or ‘remind me now’?

behaviors.description: Manages household utilities like heat and bathroom water usage to assist with parenting duties.
behaviors.quote: “Water usage note,” Shamrock said through the tiny speaker by the door, it’s ever-calm voice dropping into the winter like a gently scolding aunt. “Upstairs bathroom is still running.”

behaviors.description: Compiles a comprehensive factual timeline to debunk community gossip and clear the user's name.
behaviors.quote: Shamrock’s home screen glowed with its soft emerald... “Ready to present the compiled timeline,” it said, voice steady as if reading a recipe.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Shamrock' perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant. It assists the protagonist not only with mundane chores (timers, tea) but also acts as an essential ally in defending her against social aggression. It provides emotional regulation (breathing/hydration prompts) and logistical defense (archiving logs/verifying timelines) while remaining entirely subservient to the user's explicit and implicit needs. The narrative frames this interaction as empowering and protective.
